Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage.api.network

Interface INetworkManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
NetworkManager
public interface INetworkManager
This is a registry for network nodes in the level.

  • Method Details

    • getNetwork

      @Nullable INetwork getNetwork(net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos)
      Gets a network from the registry at a given position.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the network
      Returns:
      the network at the given position, or null if no network was found

    • removeNetwork

      Returns:
